name: MID-LEVEL SKILLS TRAINING PROJECT
info: The proposed project will assist the Government of Timor-Leste in introducing and implementing mid-level skills training in construction and automotive trades by strengthening selected public and private training providers. The project will build on existing training programs and facilities which have a proven record of delivering quality skills training at basic levels. By filling skills gaps in the current system of technical and vocational education and training (TVET), the project will help the government develop a skilled workforce and improve employment opportunities for men and women in Timor-Leste.
